Package net.evmodder.DropHeads

Class DropHeads

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
net.evmodder.EvLib.EvPlugin
net.evmodder.DropHeads.DropHeads
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
public final class DropHeads extends net.evmodder.EvLib.EvPlugin
Main class of the DropHeads plugin. Public API for plugins using DropHeads is mainly located in the HeadAPI class and the net.evmodder.dropheads.events package
